1.0.name: wordpress/breukies-archives-widget
1.0.description: Breukie’s Archives Widget is a wordPress widget, to replace the standard archives widget by Automattic. This widget displays your archives using the wp_get_archives function, utilizes all available parameters like type, limit and format. You can also set up to 9 intances of this widget in your sidebar(s).
